CustomField.description:
Course code is the QUT unique business identifier assigned to a Course.
For SAMS units it is combination of Course Code and Course Version Format <Course_Code>-<Version no> eg MAB522-3
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a code that uniquely identifies the QUTeX product/course. Codes are in the format @@@###, where @ is an alphabetic character and # is a numeric character.
CustomField.label: Code
